Im feeling quite sad and sorry for myself but ill snap out of it soon. Which emotion is expressed in this tweet? driveway.

I am just feeling cranky and blue. Which emotion is expressed in this tweet? shrive.

I can have for a treat or if i am feeling festive. Which emotion is expressed in this tweet? tre.

I feel like im caring about my body not in just an attempt to be the right size but to feel good and have a full life. Which emotion is expressed in this tweet? black.

I feel a bit funny actually. Which emotion is expressed in this tweet?
